com.dryver.Controllers

Class ElasticSearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dryver.Controllers.ElasticSearchController

  • public class ElasticSearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to communicate with the Elasticsearch server follows the Songleton design pattern.
    See Also:
    Jest, list of users

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.AddRequestTask
      A Task that adds requests to ES asynchronously
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.AddUserTask
      Adds a user to the database.
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.DeleteRequestTask
      A task that deleted requests from ES asynchronously via it's ES id
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.DeleteUserTask
      Deletes a user in the database based on the user id.
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.GetAllRequestsTask
      An asynchronous task that gets all of the requests on ES
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.GetDriverRequestsTask
      A task that gets all requests with a certain acceptedDriverID from ES asynchronously
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.GetRequestsCostTask
      A Task that gets all requests based on a certain cost
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.GetRequestsGeolocationTask
      A Task that gets all requests based on geolocation
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.GetRequestsKeywordTask
      A Task that gets all requests based on a keyword
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.GetRequestsRateTask
      A Task that gets all requests based on a certain rate
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.GetRequestTask
      A task that gets a single request from ES with it's id
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.GetRiderRequestsTask
      A Task that gets all requests associated with a rider's id from ES asynchronously
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetUsersTask
      Used to get a list of users.
      private static class  ElasticSearchController.GetUserTask
      Gets a user based on the users' user id asynchronously
